summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3541 for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, from East 65th Street to East 68th Street, and from East 70th Street to the Green Lake Low Service Reservoir; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43751, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
